get.description: The `HASURA_GRAPHQL_AUTH_HOOK` endpoint for Hasura auth. Use this endpoint to integrate Hasura's [webhook authentication flow](https://hasura.io/docs/latest/auth/authentication/webhook/).

200.description: The authenticated user claims in Hasura format. See [Hasura docs](https://hasura.io/docs/latest/auth/authentication/webhook/#webhook-response) for more information.

post.summary: Social SAML connector's Assertion Consumer Service (ACS) endpoint.
post.description: The `ACS` endpoint for all standard social SAML connector authentication flow. Logto's standard Social SAML connector will be replaced using the SSO SAML connector. This endpoint is used for `legacy connectors` only.

302.description: Returns the `redirectUrl` to the client for the next step to complete the authentication flow.

post.summary: SSO SAML connector's Assertion Consumer Service (ACS) endpoint.
post.description: The `ACS` endpoint for all SAML based SSO authentication flow.

SAMLResponse.description: The SAML assertion response from the IdP.

RelayState.description: SAML standard parameter that will be transmitted between the identity provider and the service provider. It will be used as the session ID (jti) of the user's Logto authentication session. This API will use this session ID to retrieve the SSO connector authentication session from the database.

302.description: Returns the `redirectUrl` to the client for the next step to complete the authentication flow.

404.description: Invalid SSO connector ID or SSO connector authentication session not found.
